rules_text:
[i]Destined Scions [/i]– Creatures you control with base power 2 or less have double strike.
[i]Holy Blood[/i] – Whenever a Noble you control enters, support X, where X is the number of other Nobles you control.
[i]Sons of Legend[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Any number of target creatures you control have their base power become 2 until end of turn.
